MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick is still ongoing. This is due to access issues on site and we now expect power to be back on by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.40pm on Wednesday 2nd December 2020.
